src_original: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ ki dattaṃ yanna bhujyate // Śsk_5 //
śamācca na caleccitaṃ bāhyaceṣṭā nivartanāt // Śsk_9 //  sarvatrāpacalo mandamatisnigdhābhibhāṣaṇāt /
tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram // Śsk_1 //
anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuram /
bhasmacchanno yathā vahniḥ pacyeta narakādiṣu // Śsk_11 //  ratnameghe jinenoktastena saṅkṣepasaṃvaraḥ /
iti śikṣāpadādasya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā // Śsk_14 //
paścātāpaṃ na kurvīta na ca kṛtvā prakāśayet // Śsk_15 //
śodhitasyātmabhāvasyabhogaḥ pathyo bhaviṣyati /  samyaksiddhasya bhaktasya niṣkaṇasyeva dehinām // Śsk_17 //
tṛṇacchanna yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate /
buddhāṅkurastathā vṛddhiṃ kleśacchanno na gacchati // Śsk_18 //
śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matirdṛḍhā // Śsk_2 //
sāmādhānāya yujyeta bhāvayedaśubhādikam // Śsk_20 //  bhogaśuddhiṃ ca jānīyātsamyagājīvaśodhanāt /
grahītāraḥ subahavaḥ svalpaṃ ceda manena kim /  na cātitṛptijanakaṃ vardhanīyamidaṃ tataḥ // Śsk_22 //
karuṇāṃ ca puraskṛtya yateta śubhavṛddhaye // Śsk_24 //  bhadracaryāvidhiḥ kāryo vandanādiḥ sahādarāt /
bodhicittaṃ ca puṇyasya vṛddhihetuḥ samāsataḥ // Śsk_26 //
ātmabhāvasya bhogānāṃ tryadhvavṛtteḥ śubhasya ca /  utsargaḥ sarvasattvebhyastadrakṣā śuddhivardhanam // Śsk_4 //
